metadata.description: Will Manchester United win the Premier League 2025/26?

outcome_space.description: Binary outcome for Manchester United winning the Premier League 2025/26 season

base_case.condition: Will Manchester United finish in 1st place in the Premier League 2025/26 season standings?
base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP = 1 (Yes) if Manchester United finishes in 1st position in the official Premier League 2025/26 final standings after all 38 matchday fixtures are completed. FSP = 0 (No) if any other team finishes in 1st position. The official standings are determined by the Premier League rules: points (3 for win, 1 for draw, 0 for loss), then goal difference, then goals scored, then head-to-head record, then playoff if required.

edge_cases.condition: The Premier League 2025/26 season is cancelled, abandoned, or not completed by June 30, 2026
Manchester United is relegated, dissolved, or expelled from the Premier League during the 2025/26 season
A points deduction is applied to Manchester United after the final matchday but before official ratification
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP is determined by the final ratified standings, including any points deductions

outcome_point._comment: Premier League 2025/26 season final matchday is May 24, 2026. Settlement after official confirmation.

oracle_config.description: ESPN public API for Premier League standings. Manchester United team ID is 360. No API key required.
oracle_config._evaluation_logic: If value_path returns 1, FSP = 1 (Manchester United is champion). If value_path returns any other number (2-20), FSP = 0 (Manchester United did not win).
